Package com.capgemini.persistence

Interface TaskRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Task,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Task,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Task,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Task>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Task,​java.lang.Long>
    public interface TaskRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Task,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Task,​java.lang.Long>
    Task repository that extends of JpaRepository Implements custom queries over datastore
    Author:
    gtd-g03

    • Method Detail

      • findTaskByCategoryId

        @Query("SELECT t FROM Task AS t WHERE t.category.id = ?1")
java.util.List<Task> findTaskByCategoryId​(java.lang.Long id)
        Find all tasks from a determined category
        Parameters:
        id - Id of category
        Returns:
        List of tasks within this category

      • findTaskToday

        @Query("SELECT t FROM Task AS t WHERE t.planned <= current_date ORDER BY t.planned asc")
java.util.List<Task> findTaskToday()
        Find all tasks planned for current date and in ascending order
        Returns:
        List of tasks that match criteria

      • findTaskByWeek

        @Query("SELECT t FROM Task AS t WHERE t.planned <= ?1 AND t.planned >= current_date ORDER BY t.planned, t.category.id asc")
java.util.List<Task> findTaskByWeek​(java.util.Date postDate)
        Find all tasks planned for week in course ordered by date and category
        Parameters:
        postDate - Date until search criteria
        Returns:
        List of tasks that match criteria

      • findAllIdCategories

        @Query("SELECT Distinct t.id FROM Task AS t ORDER BY t.id")
java.util.List<java.lang.Long> findAllIdCategories()
        List of all categories in data store
        Returns:
        List of all categories
